sentences.en: A new group of singers are coming to the forefront.
sentences.cn: 一群新歌手正崭露头角.

sentences.en: And SUN is at the forefront of aof that thinking as well.
sentences.cn: SUN在这考虑这些问题方面一直是走在了时代的前沿.

sentences.en: Education, quite rightly, is currently at the forefront of the political agenda.
sentences.cn: 目前教育被排在政治议程的首位，这样做非常恰当。

sentences.en: Forefront International Management Limited British Virgin Islands US $ 10 100 % Inactive.
sentences.cn: 英属处女群岛10美元暂无业务.

sentences.en: He's spent a lifetime working at the forefront of science and technology.
sentences.cn: 他在科技战线工作了一辈子.

sentences.en: His team are at the forefront of scientific research into vaccines.
sentences.cn: 他的小组处于疫苗科研的最前沿.

sentences.en: I place Einsteim in the forefront of men of importance.
sentences.cn: 在重要的人物中,我把爱因斯坦列于前茅.

sentences.en: Once again Scotland looks set to at the forefront of fisheries conservation.
sentences.cn: 看来苏格兰也会再一次站在渔业保护的前线.

sentences.en: Suddenly, the Chinese economy is at the forefront of attention.
sentences.cn: 一夜之间, 中国经济再次成为人们关注的焦点.

sentences.en: The brave soldier was in the forefront of the fighting.
sentences.cn: 那个勇敢的士兵战斗在最前线.

sentences.en: The court case was constantly in the forefront of my mind.
sentences.cn: 这宗诉讼案一直压在我心头.

sentences.en: The new factory could put the town back at the forefront of steelmaking.
sentences.cn: 这家新厂能使这个城市恢复炼钢重镇的地位.

sentences.en: The pension issue was not at the forefront of his mind in the spring of 1985.
sentences.cn: 在1985年春，养老金问题并非他关注的重点。

sentences.en: They have been at the forefront of the campaign for political change.
sentences.cn: 他们一直处于政治变革运动的风口浪尖上。

sentences.en: We plan to be in the forefront of that.
sentences.cn: 我们准备在这方面带个头.

trans.tran_cn: 最前部，活动中心，前列，第一线
trans.tran_en: If you are at the forefront of a campaign or other activity, you have a leading and influential position in it
